snippet.title: Official Trailer | Evo\Wave
snippet.description:
Evo\Wave will be available for FREE on Steam on March 12th, 2021! If you haven't already done so, feel free to wishlist the game to help us get referenced on Steam!

►►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1532180/EvoWave/

Evo\Wave is a collectathon / 3D platformer! Control the little AI named LAI-6, travel through different levels inspired by the different graphical and iconic eras of video games, repair the main console and obtain new abilities to fight the evil MagnaVex after he changed the world in a retro era!

✅Subscribe for more content & information of Evo\Wave : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGwuv8YshPXHUhI8i_9AXQw

Follow our social medias:
👍Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/EvoWave-119526256623565
🐦Twitter - https://twitter.com/EvoWaveUqat

All rights reserved.
